original_text: They answered and said unto him, If he were not a malefactor, we would not have delivered him up unto thee.
korean_text: 대답하여 이르되 이 사람이 행악자가 아니었더라면 우리가 당신에게 넘기지 아니하였겠나이다

sentences.original_text: They answered and said unto him
If he were not a malefactor
we would not have delivered him up
